# Security Policy

## Supported Version

| **Version** | **Targeted Minecraft Java Version** | **Support** |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| 1.0.2 | 1.15.2 | ✔ |
| 1.0.0 ~ 1.0.1 | 1.15.2 | ❌ |

## Report Vulnerability

Submit the issue via [GitHub](https://github.com/hugoalh/Minecraft.Java.DataPack.TagPlus/issues).
